name: simple_async_perf_tester
description: Run `index.js` with 1-2 Node environment variables. - TEST_SCRIPT - the script that registers start and end times, runs your code and outputs the delta time to stdout - TEST_RUNS (optional) - number of times your TEST_SCRIPT will be run. The higher the number the slower the test, but more accurate the results. By default runs 100 times.
